item.title: Dependencies in Go
item.author: rasa.silva@gmail.com (Ricardo Silva)
item.description: Intro As I journey into Go land, one topic that quickly comes to the table is “How to handle dependencies?” This post is my attempt at a birds-eye view on the topic. I hope newcomers to the language like me find useful.
